entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -20.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:43 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:43 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
